import React, { useState } from "react" import {Button} from './Button' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' //for webpage loading? import './Navbar.css' import Dropdown from './Dropdown' function Navbar(){ const [click, setClick] = useState(false); //click toggle for Hamburger const [dropdown, setDropdown] = useState(false);// toggle for dropdowns const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false); const onMouseEnter = () =>{ if(window.innerWidth<960){ //hides the dropdown if on mobile setDropdown(false) } else { setDropdown(true) } } return( <>

); } export default Navbar;
